title: Prayer Matters - What to Pray?
content:
Your browser does not support the audio element. Download MP3 Audio
Saturday EV Sermon Podcast Sunday EV Sermon Podcast Nite EV Sermon Podcast Peninsula EV Sermon Podcast Summerfest Podcast Listen Download Podcast Prayer Matters - What to Pray? Ephesians 3:14-21 | 20/09/2015 | Nathan Sandon Nathan Sandon looks at what the Bible says about the priorities for prayer, challenging us to pray for God's power to indwell us, renewing our hearts to be filled with the fullness of God.Have you grasp the costly love of God, which gives glory to God rather than self, and allowing this to transform how you pray, think and do church?
